text: Seppo Vainio (3 January 1937 - 14 December 2020) was a Finnish ice hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1960 Winter Olympics. He was born in Helsinki. Vainio died on 14 December 2020 in Rauma, Finland at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Finnish ice hockey forwards
title: Seppo Vainio
